Sequence Information.Target Organism: Tumor cells:MDA-MB-231 (56 ± 0.06% Growth inhibition=40 μM; IC50=53.2 ± 13 μM); HeLa (IC50=35.0 ± 1 μM); A431 (IC50=49.5 ± 6 μM); PANC-1 (IC50=57.5 ± 6 μM); HepG2 (IC50>60 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:14 ± 1.4% Hemolysis=375 µM; IC50=14 ± 1.4 µM
